body:
So, credit giveaway! This is a 3000 credit giveaway! I know that's not much but it's worth it. So here is how to win. Be the first to decode the message bellow. This ends on March 10, 2016. You may submit multiple guesses. Let the guessing begin!

FQAUHSX DAHHQ

Hint+Clarification:

It is encoded, not scrambled. You need to figure out the pattern in order to figure out the message. I recommend starting by looking at the alphabet, knowing that the message starts with "G".
